#summary Guide for 2011 peoples

= Welcome 2011 GRAFers =

== Some things you might like to visit before getting started ==

 * [http://code.google.com/p/graf-framework/wiki/HowGRAFWorks GRAF] - A brief rundown on how GRAF works
 * [http://code.google.com/p/graf-framework/wiki/2010Overview 2010] - What went on in 2010
 * [http://code.google.com/p/graf-framework/wiki/GrafFuture Future] - Where the 2011 project may be headed
 * [http://code.google.com/p/graf-framework/files/thesis.pdf Gregs thesis] - The inspiration for GRAF  
 * [http://code.google.com/p/graf-framework/wiki/Quickstartguide Quick Start Guide] - Installing GRAF 
 * [http://code.google.com/p/graf-framework/wiki/grafIntro Models] - An explanation of some of the models supplied with GRAF

To change the side bar and set up a new wiki index -> Go to 'Administer' then 'Wiki' and its near the bottom of the page! 

Make sure you get access to the 2010 and 2009 alliance sites too.

As a word of advice when editing and viewing wiki pages its best not to use Internet Explorer 8 or earlier as it seems to not agree with what Chrome and Firefox see!
